Face unlock lets you unlock your device by looking at it. Keep in mind:

● Your device may unlock any time you look at it.
● Your device can be unlocked by someone else if they hold it in front of your face while your eyes are open.
● Your device may also be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, such as a child or identical sibling.
Data recorded by face unlock will be permanently and securely deleted. After removal, you will need your PIN, pattern, or password to unlock your phone.
